soulsow.name: Soulsow
soulsow.description: Grants Soulsow buff, enabling Harvest Moon. Can only be used outside combat.

harpe.name: Harpe
harpe.description: Ranged magic attack. Used as a pre-pull GCD to start combat.

shadow_of_death.name: Shadow of Death
shadow_of_death.description: Applies Death's Design debuff to target, increasing damage taken by 10% for 30s. Generates 10 Soul gauge.

soul_slice.name: Soul Slice
soul_slice.description: Delivers an attack with 460 potency. Generates 50 Soul gauge. 2 charges, 30s recast.

arcane_circle.name: Arcane Circle
arcane_circle.description: Increases damage dealt by self and nearby party members by 3% for 20s. Grants Circle of Sacrifice to party for 5s. 120s cooldown raid buff.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.description: Delivers an attack with 520 potency. Grants 2 stacks of Soul Reaver and 2 stacks of Executioner.

gibbet.name: Gibbet
gibbet.description: Delivers an attack with 500 potency. Flank positional bonus: 560 potency. Consumes Soul Reaver/Executioner.

gallows.name: Gallows
gallows.description: Delivers an attack with 500 potency. Rear positional bonus: 560 potency. Consumes Soul Reaver/Executioner.

blood_stalk.name: Blood Stalk
blood_stalk.description: Delivers an attack with 340 potency. Grants 1 stack of Soul Reaver.

plentiful_harvest.name: Plentiful Harvest
plentiful_harvest.description: Delivers an attack with potency scaling from Immortal Sacrifice stacks (720-1000). Generates 50 Shroud gauge.

enshroud.name: Enshroud
enshroud.description: Enters Enshroud for 30s, granting 5 Lemure Shroud. Costs 50 Shroud gauge.

void_reaping.name: Void Reaping
void_reaping.description: Delivers an attack with 500 potency. Can only be used during Enshroud. Grants Void Shroud.

cross_reaping.name: Cross Reaping
cross_reaping.description: Delivers an attack with 500 potency. Can only be used during Enshroud. Grants Void Shroud.

lemures_slice.name: Lemure's Slice
lemures_slice.description: Delivers an attack with 240 potency. Can only be used during Enshroud. Costs 2 Void Shroud.

communio.name: Communio
communio.description: Deals magic damage with 1100 potency. Enshroud finisher. Can only be used with 1 Lemure Shroud remaining.

perfectio.name: Perfectio
perfectio.description: Delivers an attack with 1300 potency. Can only be used after Communio. Post-Communio finisher.

slice.name: Slice
slice.description: Delivers an attack with 300 potency. First hit of the basic combo.

waxing_slice.name: Waxing Slice
waxing_slice.description: Delivers an attack with 400 potency when comboed from Slice. Second hit of the basic combo.

infernal_slice.name: Infernal Slice
infernal_slice.description: Delivers an attack with 500 potency when comboed from Waxing Slice. Third hit of the basic combo.

harvest_moon.name: Harvest Moon
harvest_moon.description: Deals magic damage with 800 potency. Can only be used when Soulsow buff is active. Ranged attack.
